Attach ArbotixM to the Base Plate using: Attach Servo Motor 1 to Top Plastic Plate using 10 M2X8 Socket Heads.
Attach F3 Bracket onto Horn of Servo Motor 1 using 4 M2X6 Socket Heads.
Attach Motor 2 onto F3 Bracket using 4 M2X6 Socket Heads (Check that the horn is pointing to the right).
Attach Top Servo Plate to F2 Bracket using 4 M2X8 Socket Heads and 4 M2 Nuts.
“Bottom Plate, Board, 4 M3X6 Screws”: “F2 Bracket, Mounting Plate, 4 M2 Nuts, 4 M2X8 Screws”

Attach ArbotixM to the Base Plate using: Fasten F2 Bracket on Horn Side using 4 M2X6 Socket Heads.
“Bottom Plate, Board, 4 M3X6 Screws”: “AX Hub Assembly, Stage 3.2, Stage 4.1, 4 M2X6 Screws”

Attach ArbotixM to the Base Plate using: Screw 4 M3X30 Standoff with 4 M3X15 Standoff to create 4 different Standoffs.
Attach Standoffs to Bottom Plate using 4 M3X6 Socket Heads.
Attach Top Plate to Base Plate using 4 M3X6 Socket Heads.
Attach FTDI Cable to Laptop and Arbotix Board.
Attach Power Jack to Arbotix Board and plug into wall socket.
Run Robot Turret Simple Test Script.
